alert.note: Alert for Churchill; Lyon; Washoe (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 03 at 7:23PM PDT until August 03 at 9:15PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Western Churchill County in west central Nevada... Southern Washoe County in western Nevada... Northern Lyon County in west central Nevada... * Until 915 PM PDT. * At 720 PM PDT, an area of blowing dust extended from I-80 near the Nightingale exit to the Carson Sink and near Stillwater, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with wind gusts to 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Reduced visibility with blowing dust for parts of I-80 between Nightingale and Fernley, US-95 between Trinity Junction and Fallon, and US-50/Alternate 50 between Fernley and Fallon. * This area of dust is projected to reach the Fallon vicinity between 800 and 830 PM. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lahontan Reservoir, Fernley, Silver Springs, Hazen, Stillwater, and Fallon Municipal Airport. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be hazardous. Delay or reroute travel. Remain aware of the weather.
